item.title: The Birth and Death of Meaning: An Interdisciplinary Perspective on the Problem of Man
item.description: Description # Ernest Becker’s The Birth and Death of Meaning: An Interdisciplinary Perspective on the Problem of Man is a profound exploration of human nature and the quest for meaning in life.
